help-file.title: "INSECTS"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: No Cumulative: N/A Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Generic
When cast, "Insects" creates up to four poisonous illusionary swarms of insects out of thin air that attacks the victim. The illusion will end when the victim dies or leaves the area for a time and if the caster dies or the duration of the spell ends. The illusion will also end after it has taken enough damage. Any victim of the poisoning will continue to be poisoned until it wears off or is neutralized.
